com.apw.Steering

Class SteeringBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.apw.Steering.SteeringBase
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Steerable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SteeringMk1, SteeringMk2, SteeringModule

    public abstract class SteeringBase
extends java.lang.Object
implements Steerable
    Steering base is the base code for all child steering objects.
    Author:
    kevin, carl, nathan

      • curveSteepness

        public double curveSteepness(double turnAngle)
        Description copied from interface: Steerable
        Gets how steep a turn will be. 1.0 being the sparest turn, 0 being no turn.
        Specified by:
        curveSteepness in interface Steerable
        Parameters:
        turnAngle - angle from center line to furthest point
        Returns:
        how steep the turn will be

      • getDegreeOffset

        public int getDegreeOffset()
        Gets the degree offset between the origin (center bottom of the screen), and the steerPoint (The point where the car is attempting to steer towards).
        Returns:
        the degreeOffset, as a integer.
